direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve adding elements to the collection, with addAll iterating over a collection and calling add for each element.
Both methods process a collection of elements, performing operations (addition vs. removal) on each element.
Both methods modify the collection based on the elements of another collection, with retainAll keeping only the elements present in the provided collection.
Both methods involve iterating over the collection and performing conditional operations (addition vs. removal based on a predicate).
Both methods affect the internal state of the collection, with reindex rebuilding the index after modifications.
